name: SERRED
goal:
Serred mission statement is to promote the safe, efficient and environmentally responsible design, manufacturing, collection, reconditioning, remanufacturing and re-use of reusable industrial packaging, including preparation for recycling at the end of its useful life.
Goals:
1. Professionalise the reconditioning industry based on best practice
2. Place re-use before recycling – respect of the waste hierarchy
3. Promote safe re-usable packaging vs one-way packaging – promote circular economy – sustainable solutions – reduce carbon footprint
4. Advise and help governments and authorities with relation to re-use & recycling of industrial packaging
5. Remove barriers and restrictions for the industry
6. Strive for incentives to use reusable packaging and ensure packaging re-use
euInitiatives: Circular economy, waste framework directive and packaging and packaging waste directive
